page.title: 15Shopping in Bentley
page.content: In Bentley we have several places to go shopping.At Bentley stores you can buy food,sweets,household items and cards.There is a sub post office in the shop.There are some things which the Stores doesn't have or which are very dear so many people go into Ipswich or Colchester for most of their shopping. At Uplands fruit Farm you can buy apples,pears,eggs and apple juice. Next to Bentley stores there is a unisex hairdressers Sometimes people sell surplus produce forn their gardens from stalls outside their house.
